name: .DZT File Extension
summary: Learn about .DZT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: DVD authoring file used by PowerDirector, a program used to create DVDs; contains title screen graphics, animations, and text; used for creating DVD introductions; also used for sharing titles online through CyberLink's DirectorZone website.

content: DZT files can only be used with DVDs that are authored with the same aspect ratio. For example, a 4:3 title can only be used with a 4:3 DVD.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
